prs.title: v4: `.toJSONSchema`: Enforce spec-based optional logic (`required`) and simplify `additionalProperties` for strict objects
Add pattern to json schema if present
Fix params option to work with regex method
Fix improper function definition in migration guide
Update benchmark instructions to include switching to the v4 branch
